item.title: Shop help :''''''''(
item.dc:creator: @modzilla modzilla
item.description:
@modzilla wrote:

Hey guys i made this shop so when you talk to him and if u have 99 he sells you a trim cape untrim cape and hood for 99k… But it gives you regardless if you have how would i edit that???

Basically i need it to say you dont have 99k and if you dont it doesnt give you cape… I am brain farting here people!!!

if(npc.getId() == 4288) { if (p.getSkills().getLevel(1) < 99) { p.sm("You don't have 99 Attack! Come back in a bit!"); }else{ npc.getUpdateFlags().setForceTextUpdateRequired(true); npc.forceChat("Come Talk To Me For A HandBook About Castlewars Or Capes."); p.getInventory().deleteItem(995, 99000); p.getInventory().addItem(9747, 1); p.getInventory().addItem(9748, 1); p.getInventory().addItem(9749, 1); p.sm("you bought an attack Skillcape for 99k."); } }
My code

Read full topic
